### Tender Description
Canada is seeking proposals to procure four (4) 22.86 metre aerial ladder fire fighting vehicles and ancillary items. The vehicles must meet the specifications outlined in Annex - Pricing and Annex - Purchase Description. The procurement encourages bidders to submit an Indigenous Participation Plan (IPP) to demonstrate their commitment to Indigenous participation in the procurement process. The evaluation criteria for the IPP will be outlined in the solicitation document.
